name: **Bullaun Rock**
description: Bullaun Rock W707-489 Sheet 87 The island is located just off the Big Doon and separated from it by a narrow channel. The island is low and rocky but bigger in area than one would suspect. The best landing place is onto rock platforms on the SW corner, for vertical progress. Land elsewhere depending on conditions. No water, no camping, but a good place to stop if on passage to view the very attractive coastline in Newfoundland Bay.
